attributes.action: To spend a greater amount of public money in research on alterntive to petrol to run our cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to find a renewable alterntive to petrol to run our cars, and slowly introduce the change to selected stubance before oil runs out or hits $500 dollars a barrel.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
